channel.title: OUT FOR VACATION on Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Community
channel.description: Recent content in OUT FOR VACATION on Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Community

item.title: Tuesday calls on break
item.description: Our weekly Tuesday calls (8AM PT) are on a break during July and August 2024. We’ll be back on 3rd of September at 8 AM using the same existing recurrent invite. Other community calls will continue normally without breaks during this time. You can see and download recurrent invites to all calls from https://aka.ms/community/calls All calls are being recorded and published within our YouTube channel where you’ll find new content each and every business day.
